Text:
I'm on Xubuntu and I only get video when I use Parole Player and I get only audio when I use VLC.
It could be I'm missing some codec though.
Does anyone have an idea how to get both audio and video in one player?
Update VLC to the latest stable edition , also check if you have the latest codecs for the other video players as VLC codecs are for its sole usage .
Cheers and thanks for that UA-07 ;-)

Thanks for the advice UA-07. I have the mediabuntu repo in my sources and have "restricted-extras" and "bad" codec packages installed and quite a few other. Everything is up-to-date.
Is there any package in particular I should install?
